emuInput.TitMainTitle: Young man standing beside boxer Ezzard Charles, in Uptown Gym
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1950, pg. 22, reads: "Heavier Ezz Charles Set to Face Beshore in Buffalo - The Champ in Action - The Courier cameraman was on the scene last week in Pittsburgh to catch these action shots of NBA King Ezzard Charles as he went through training chores for his coming fight with Freddie Beshore, in Buffalo, N. Y., Feb. 28. The fight will be Ezzard's third defense of his heavyweight title... - Harris Photos."
